## Plot 1: Scatter plot -- `CPAT` against `CDF`

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
require(plotly)
require(data.table)
require(cowplot)
require(htmltools)
wtf <- fread('CDF.txt')
wtf <- data.table(wtf, fuck = exp(wtf$value))
wtf <- wtf[sample(nrow(wtf), 5000), ]
p <- ggplot() + geom_jitter(data = wtf, aes(x = fuck, y = value, colour = type), alpha = 0.4) + scale_x_continuous(expand  = c(0,0)) + scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) + xlab('Coding Probability (CPAT)') + ylab('CDF')
ggplotly(p)
```

## Plot 2: Density plot -- `Transcript length` against `Density`

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
wtf <- wtf[,1:2]
wtf$value <- wtf$value * 50000
wtf <- wtf[sample(nrow(wtf), 5000), ]
p <- ggplot() + geom_density(data = wtf, aes(x = value, colour = type)) + xlab('Transcript length') + ylab('Density') + scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0.01, 0)) + scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0.01, 0))
ggplotly(p)
```
